TEXT.TITLE: SWEDEN OKAYS CYTRX <CYTR> BIOPOOL ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: CytRx Corp said the Swedish authorites and the Bank of Sweden approved its acquisition of Biopool AB of Sweden through a 60 pct owned Delaware corporate subsidiary, CytRx Biopool Ltd. Reuter
